10 years married.title: 10 years married
10 years married.summary: I would like to thank RSVP because my wife Angela and I as we are about to reach our 10th wedding anniversary.

children.text: I would like to thank RSVP because my wife Angela and I as we are about to reach our 10th wedding anniversary.
I was a RSVP sceptic at first however when I was finally talked into posting on RSVP I never looked back.

I had been divorced for 2 years at the time and found it hard to talk to people or go out alone. I had been married for 20 years and never went anywhere alone so dating was difficult. RSVP made it so easy and safe.

After talking to Ange we quickly realized that we actually went to school together (she doesn¿t remember me) in a small town not far away and I was in the same class as her younger sister, small world.
Angela inherited 4 step children and now 6 grand kids and she wanted to be called NANGE (nana Ange) I only inherited 2 step children. I think I got the better end of the deal, ha ha
We are off to New Zealand for 3 weeks to celebrate in April.
Thank you very much RSVP

13 years happy.title: 13 years happy
13 years happy.summary: We met via RSVP in 2002. On March 2004 we were married (at Magnetic Island).

children.text: We met via RSVP in 2002. On March 2004 we were married (at Magnetic Island).
This coming March 2017 will be our 13 wedding anniversary. We are both grateful for RSVP putting us in touch with each other.
Brendan "kissed" me via RSVP September 9, 2013.
September 15, 2013, we became boyfriend and girlfriend, partners.
August 2014 I moved in with Brendan, shifting from Preston to Cheltenham.
September 15th, 2015 Brendan took me on a surprise trip to the cook islands and proposed, at sunset with a poem.
September 15th, 2017 we got married.
September 15th, 2018 we celebrate 1 year of marriage and 5 years together.
We are currently building a house together and looking forward to shifting into our shared dream and future home hopefully late 2018.
It sounds corny and cheesy, but Brendan is my rock. He lifts me up. He supports me like no other. He is my whole love, my whole life, my whole world.

Our favorite activities include exploring new areas including travelling locally in and around Victoria, and Australia when we can by way of day trips and short weekends away. We have traveled internationally on occasion. We love a picnic. We like walks, and visiting the ocean. We love taking our toy poodle Nectar to the park or beach to play a never ending game of fetch. We hope to build our family in the coming years.

Baby Branko.title: Baby Branko
Baby Branko.summary: When I first registered with RSVP I wasn't sure if I would be safe and didn't know if I would find someone suitable for me and someone who wouldn't judge me.

children.text: When I first registered with RSVP I wasn't sure if I would be safe and didn't know if I would find someone suitable for me and someone who wouldn't judge me.

I met Matthew and we went on his motorcycle for our fist date that alone scared me! However I ended up feeling so comfortable with him once we arrived at the beach, we really hit it off making jokes and hugging each other laying on the beach.

Not long after he was on his way home from work and had an accident on the road, he was in hospital for nearly 5 months. It was hard but I could not leave him he is my best friend and my future husband.
A few months after this all happened we found out we were expecting a baby. Our baby is nearly 5 months and we named him after Matthews dad Branko. Thank you for bringing us together.

Blissfully happy.title: Blissfully happy
Blissfully happy.summary: We met online in 2006. We got chatting and realised our kids went to the same scout's group. We then realised they went to the same school and our boys were in the same grade.

children.text: We met online in 2006. We got chatting and realised our kids went to the same scout's group. We then realised they went to the same school and our boys were in the same grade.

We chatted on the phone for a couple of months, dated for many years and were married in February 2014. We are best friends and more deeply in love with each passing year. We now have our first grandchild and are blissfully happy!

Chance of a lifetime.title: Chance of a lifetime
Chance of a lifetime.summary: Thought I would never meet someone so good to be true. Especially not on RSVP, but I was wrong.

children.text: Thought I would never meet someone so good to be true. Especially not on RSVP, but I was wrong.
Started chatting with Brent in early Feb 2014 and we met up end of Feb 2014. Our story is like a flower that slowly blossomed into a great romance.
Ever since we met, we have been inseparable. We get each other. We have great sense of humour. We love being with each other. We support each other. I fall more in love with this guy every day.

We married in Dec 2015. It¿s not always roses. We do have days where we disagree. But that is what¿s making us understand and appreciate each other even more. And today, Jan 18, 2017, after almost 3 years, we are 5 months pregnant and happily married. And looking forward for more fun, happy and exciting times ahead together.
Thanks RSVP for this chance of a lifetime.

Common interest connection.title: Common interest connection
Common interest connection.summary: I actually met Hamish 5 years ago through work & I had a crush on him from those three or four times I had met him in meetings, but RSVP reintroduced us! And helped us connect by helping us to find out all our common interests like our passion for outdoor adventuring like rock climbing!

children.text: I actually met Hamish 5 years ago through work & I had a crush on him from those three or four times I had met him in meetings, but RSVP reintroduced us! And helped us connect by helping us to find out all our common interests like our passion for outdoor adventuring like rock climbing!

On our first RSVP date he took me rock climbing in the Blue Mountains! Perfect first date in the great outdoors. Only been 3 dates so far but let's see where it goes. Hamish is going to Europe for 5 weeks so that will be a good test. But as they say absence makes the heart grow stronger!

Couldn't be happier.title: Couldn't be happier
Couldn't be happier.summary: Gary and I met on the 26th April 2013, I knew he was special the first time we met. We have lived together for the past 14 months and we couldn't be happier.

children.text: Gary and I met on the 26th April 2013, I knew he was special the first time we met. We have lived together for the past 14 months and we couldn't be happier.
Thank you RSVP for helping me met the love of my life.

Found my keeper.title: Found my keeper
Found my keeper.summary: I found my keeper on RSVP! I was about take a break from online dating when shelly had just joined. I message her and she replied and now we have been together for 8 months and looking forward to the future we will move in together and get married in the near future.

children.text: I found my keeper on RSVP! I was about take a break from online dating when shelly had just joined. I message her and she replied and now we have been together for 8 months and looking forward to the future we will move in together and get married in the near future.
I have tried other dating sites but always came back to RSVP because people on other sites were not after a serious relationship. So thanks to RSVP I definitely found my keeper!

Getting married.title: Getting married
Getting married.summary: We met via RSVP and had our first date on the 7 April 2015. We are getting married on our three year anniversary day - 7 April 2018. We feel truly blessed to spend the rest of our lives together.

children.text: We met via RSVP and had our first date on the 7 April 2015. We are getting married on our three year anniversary day - 7 April 2018. We feel truly blessed to spend the rest of our lives together.

Getting married!.title: Getting married!
Getting married!.summary: Yohan and I went on our first date on a Sunday evening in Feb 2014. Two years later, we are engaged and getting married in 20 days!

children.text: Yohan and I went on our first date on a Sunday evening in Feb 2014. Two years later, we are engaged and getting married in 20 days!

The two of us were quite cynical of online dating, and in our own little lives signed up - to our amazement we have found the greatest love there is in each other. To all the single ones out there - With a little bit of persistence and magic there is love out there.
Here is a good place to start.

Happily married with children.title: Happily married with children
Happily married with children.summary: We met on RSVP back in 2007. I took her on a date, it lasted 3 hours which almost felt like love and first sight.

children.text: We met on RSVP back in 2007. I took her on a date, it lasted 3 hours which almost felt like love and first sight.
We got married in 2011 and had our first child in 2013, our second child was born in 2016. Two wonderful boys and most of all a success story from your website!

Happy to be engaged.title: Happy to be engaged
Happy to be engaged.summary: We first met on 25th September 2014 after chatting on RSVP for a while. We took a chance and have been together ever since that first date. Without RSVP, we may never have crossed paths as we live in different cities.

children.text: We first met on 25th September 2014 after chatting on RSVP for a while. We took a chance and have been together ever since that first date. Without RSVP, we may never have crossed paths as we live in different cities.

There has been a lot of commuting back & forth. It has been an amazing time with a lot of memories. On Friday night 5th of January 2018, Michael asked me to marry him and it was a BIG YES through happy tears! We are both excited and happy to be engaged and it's another chapter in our lives beginning now.

We wanted to thank RSVP and to let people know the site works and there are genuine people out there. This is just our story but I am sure there are many others out there who have found love on this site and had successful unions. We are excited about our news and we're happy to share the excitement with RSVP who helped us get where we are today.
So here's Cheers & a big thank you too. All the best, Michael & Karen

Happy together.title: Happy together
Happy together.summary: I met a lovely man - it's like we have known each other forever - We are both extremely happy together!

children.text: I met a lovely man - it's like we have known each other forever - We are both extremely happy together!

Hawaii Proposal.title: Hawaii Proposal
Hawaii Proposal.summary: I had being using RSVP on and off for a few years with some 'interesting' results. But I was determined to keep looking on the RSVP website.

children.text: I had being using RSVP on and off for a few years with some 'interesting' results. But I was determined to keep looking on the RSVP website.

Then one day Jon contacted me. He had only separated from his wife 6 weeks earlier and I knew as soon as I met him that if I hadn't snapped up such a good catch someone else would have pretty quickly.
After being together for 4 years Jon proposed while we were on holidays in Hawaii. On the 5th anniversary of our first date we were married on a beach in Kiama, NSW.
Thank you RSVP for contributing to my 'happily ever after' story!

Hit it off.title: Hit it off
Hit it off.summary: My girlfriends at work put me up on RSVP, they thought it was time to get on with life!! Mick and I met in late 2006 and we hit it off straight away with many common interests and ideals.

children.text: My girlfriends at work put me up on RSVP, they thought it was time to get on with life!! Mick and I met in late 2006 and we hit it off straight away with many common interests and ideals.
Mick was twice divorced so it was surprising that he thought about a relationship again let alone go looking for one!!

For me I found a man who cooks, shops and is caring and considerate so of course I hung on to him! We bought a house together in 2007 then married in mid 2008 so we are celebrating 10 years of marriage this year!
We now have 4 grandchildren and are both retired and enjoying the travelling and grey nomading!!
Thanks to RSVP, something I was wary of at first, and Mick was just plain scared of... We are now enjoying a wonderful life together.

It all started with a kiss.title: It all started with a kiss
It all started with a kiss.summary: It all started with a kiss. We met almost four years ago, and since then life has been close to perfect. We were married in 2017 and are looking forward to growing our family of 2. Thank you RSVP for matching us ever so perfectly.

children.text: It all started with a kiss. We met almost four years ago, and since then life has been close to perfect. We were married in 2017 and are looking forward to growing our family of 2. Thank you RSVP for matching us ever so perfectly.

It was destiny.title: It was destiny
It was destiny.summary: We met on RSVP in 2013. I was keen to meet her in person but she was hesitant.

children.text: We met on RSVP in 2013. I was keen to meet her in person but she was hesitant.
We did finally meet on June 13 2013. One date after the other after 3 years we got engaged and started our happily ever after last November 27 2016.
We had a perfect wedding. It was destiny meeting each other on RSVP. Thanks to you guys.

Keith \u0026 Rolien.title: Keith & Rolien
Keith \u0026 Rolien.summary: On the 16th of March 2015 a kiss on RSVP connected two strangers from two different countries with one another.

children.text: On the 16th of March 2015 a kiss on RSVP connected two strangers from two different countries with one another.
It was love at first sight. There was literally that spark and connection between the two of us from the start.

After many messages on RSVP, mobile text messages, calls, live skype conversations and emails, we finally met in person when Keith visited me in South Africa in September/October 2015 and went on a journey of visiting family, friends and surrounding places. Then two months later I came to Australia.
On 16 March 2016, Keith asked me to marry him. I said ¿YES¿ and we got engaged. We started talking and planning for a wedding, which resulted in us being happily married on the 14th of May 2016.
Thank you RSVP for making it possible that we could meet each other. We will always recommend RSVP as the best dating site in the world.

Koh Samui honeymoon.title: Koh Samui honeymoon
Koh Samui honeymoon.summary: When we met in July 2013 we knew it was special. We became engaged in October 2014 and we have just returned from out honeymoon in Koh Samui following our wedding on 2nd April 2016. We are very happy we found each other!

children.text: When we met in July 2013 we knew it was special. We became engaged in October 2014 and we have just returned from out honeymoon in Koh Samui following our wedding on 2nd April 2016. We are very happy we found each other!

Long time coming.title: Long time coming
Long time coming.summary: We were both 53 years old when we met, both of us from a different country living in Australia for more than 27 years.

children.text: We were both 53 years old when we met, both of us from a different country living in Australia for more than 27 years.

I've been divorced for 20 years and my partner had been single for 6 years. I didn't believe that there was someone out there for me but my daughter did so as a joke she made a profile for me on RSVP a couple of years ago.

I met a few gentlemen from the site but I didn't have to wait too long to meet the right person. We believe that we've been waiting for each other for 53 years. We met 6 months ago and now we are planning our wedding.
Thank you RSVP for helping us, without you we would have never met.

Losing time together.title: Losing time together
Losing time together.summary: From the very first moment we had a strong attraction towards each other. This attraction has only expanded and grown.

children.text: From the very first moment we had a strong attraction towards each other. This attraction has only expanded and grown.

We both feel like the luckiest people alive. We find ourselves losing time together when together or even on the phone. I believe we have found the real true love that every one is searching for. It is possible. Keep believing.

Married with puppies.title: Married with puppies
Married with puppies.summary: We met around Christmas 2012 - Shanyn lived on the other side of town but it was holidays so the drive didn't bother me. We shared common values of fun & fitness and obviously connected very well. Shanyn said it just came easily and there was no need to pretend to be anyone else.

children.text: We met around Christmas 2012 - Shanyn lived on the other side of town but it was holidays so the drive didn't bother me. We shared common values of fun & fitness and obviously connected very well. Shanyn said it just came easily and there was no need to pretend to be anyone else.
Five years later and we are happily married with puppies! Thank-you RSVP.

My Aussie girl!.title: My Aussie girl!
My Aussie girl!.summary: I left New York and travelled to Australia for a business contract when a client suggested trying RSVP, less than a week after joining I met an amazing girl! I might have to make this contract permanent!

children.text: I left New York and travelled to Australia for a business contract when a client suggested trying RSVP, less than a week after joining I met an amazing girl! I might have to make this contract permanent!

My partner in crime!.title: My partner in crime!
My partner in crime!.summary: Jas and I moved in after a few months and have lived together ever since.

children.text: Jas and I moved in after a few months and have lived together ever since.
We got engaged in June in Paris and are building our home together so we can be married at home when it is all renovated next year.
Thank you RSVP for helping us find our "partners in crime"!
Thanks RSVP!
We met here and are getting married soon. It¿s our happily ever after and we couldn't be happier and can't explain how lucky we are.
Thanks for making this possible!

Soon to be married.title: Soon to be married
Soon to be married.summary: We were both finding it hard to find someone special. Being introverts we didn't venture out much to meet new people, so we were both using RSVP which made it very easy to find someone we wanted to meet.

children.text: We were both finding it hard to find someone special. Being introverts we didn't venture out much to meet new people, so we were both using RSVP which made it very easy to find someone we wanted to meet.
After the first date we decided to keep meeting up and we spent a lot of time together on a holiday and weekends.
Now we moved into a new place and soon to be married and start the rest of our lives together!

Soon to be married!.title: Soon to be married!
Soon to be married!.summary: Andrew and I started chatting on RSVP in early Feb14. We only talked for four days before deciding to catch up. I made sure I had a backup plan in case he was crazy. Luckily we hit it off straight away.

children.text: Andrew and I started chatting on RSVP in early Feb14. We only talked for four days before deciding to catch up. I made sure I had a backup plan in case he was crazy. Luckily we hit it off straight away.
Fast forward three years, we have two houses, been on about 10 amazing holidays, recently engaged and soon to have a beautiful Fijian wedding in September.
Honestly he is the man of my dreams and I NEVER would have met him if it wasn't for RSVP. Whilst we have similar interests we lived so far away from each other that we would never have crossed paths.
I couldn't be happier with where our life is at and am so incredibly thankful we met.

Soul Mates.title: Soul Mates
Soul Mates.summary: We met on RSVP and have had a great life together ever since. We get along really well, and wish to spend the rest of our lives together. We both feel that we have found our soul mates.

children.text: We met on RSVP and have had a great life together ever since. We get along really well, and wish to spend the rest of our lives together. We both feel that we have found our soul mates.

Sparks.title: Sparks
Sparks.summary: From the first moment, the spark in Grants eye was undeniable. With the geographical distance between us it was lovely having space to just chat and very quickly became evident that there was an exceptionally beautiful connection here.

children.text: From the first moment, the spark in Grants eye was undeniable. With the geographical distance between us it was lovely having space to just chat and very quickly became evident that there was an exceptionally beautiful connection here.

Though we kidded ourselves it was just friendship for some time, till we could deny it no longer and met up. Now, this weekend, Grant is relocating to be closer on super beautiful foundations... new beginnings all round.

What was supportive about RSVP compared with other sites was the ability to filter on criteria like not wanting kids, alcohol status in particular, as it's rare to meet people who drink no alcohol and prefer quality in connection.
Thanks RSVP - and all the best to everyone here open to meeting someone special.

Thankful.title: Thankful
Thankful.summary: Hi everyone at RSVP. We are so thankful on this site because this is where we first started a year ago and living together for 8 months now.

children.text: Hi everyone at RSVP. We are so thankful on this site because this is where we first started a year ago and living together for 8 months now.
We are continually loving and learning from each other and so many plans for the future and we both believed that we both need each other no matter what...

Thanks for bringing us together.title: Thanks for bringing us together
Thanks for bringing us together.summary: We met on RSVP in 2005 and have been together now for 12 years. We got engaged on a romantic cruise around the Greek Islands in 2012 and bought a business together the same year.

children.text: We met on RSVP in 2005 and have been together now for 12 years. We got engaged on a romantic cruise around the Greek Islands in 2012 and bought a business together the same year.
We have both been married before so the wedding is not a priority - we will get to it eventually!
Thanks for bringing us together.

The best decision.title: The best decision
The best decision.summary: We had our first date 5 years ago today! We are now happily married with 5 kids between us. Step-parenting is tough but we are so perfect together we make it work. The best decision I've ever made was to join RSVP.

children.text: We had our first date 5 years ago today! We are now happily married with 5 kids between us. Step-parenting is tough but we are so perfect together we make it work. The best decision I've ever made was to join RSVP.

The perfect fit.title: The perfect fit
The perfect fit.summary: Thanks RSVP! We meet, fell in love and married!

children.text: Thanks RSVP! We meet, fell in love and married!
We fit well in life goals and wants, family and love. We fit like we have known each other for many many years.
Thanks RSVP for a second chance a new love, a new marriage and a new life.

The rest is history.title: The rest is history
The rest is history.summary: I sent a kiss then he sent a message and literally the rest is history!

children.text: I sent a kiss then he sent a message and literally the rest is history!
We have been together 9 years, married for 6 and if it wasn't for RSVP it would have been difficult for our paths to meet. I was a coastal girl through and through and he was in Western Brisbane.

We recommended it to all our friends and they have then met their husband or wife! We have had an amazing journey together and are about to welcome our 4th son into this crazy world and often find ourselves laughing at the way we met. Everyone's soul partner is out there!

Tied the knot.title: Tied the knot
Tied the knot.summary: Thank you so much to RSVP! We met 3 years ago on here and have been head over heels ever since!

children.text: Thank you so much to RSVP! We met 3 years ago on here and have been head over heels ever since!
It was definitely love at first sight and we have just made it official and tied the knot (2018).

Took the plunge.title: Took the plunge
Took the plunge.summary: I was originally waiting for the boys to contact me and then after advice for a colleague I took the plunge to send a 'kiss' to 5 guys. I was lucky enough that Mark replied and sent me an email.

children.text: I was originally waiting for the boys to contact me and then after advice for a colleague I took the plunge to send a 'kiss' to 5 guys. I was lucky enough that Mark replied and sent me an email.
We met for the first time up at Barzura in Coogee on a Saturday morning in October 2012. I didn't end up meeting any of the other guys as I knew Mark was worth getting to know more.
We moved in together after 11 months, engaged a year later, married in 5 months and now have a beautiful daughter Addison.
We have been together for 4 years yet we can't remember life without each other. Although we took a bit longer to find 'the one', once we did it all fell into place so naturally.
We are both so glad that we found each other and grateful to RSVP for giving us the platform to do so.

We found each other.title: We found each other
We found each other.summary: It was a fairy-tale come true. Two busy people with matching personalities and interests found each other in the big city.

children.text: It was a fairy-tale come true. Two busy people with matching personalities and interests found each other in the big city.
Once we connected on RSVP and it was love at first sight for both of us. Love blossomed and only a year later we were engaged!
We recently had our dream wedding and couldn't be happier!
Thanks RSVP for providing a platform for us to meet our dream partners

We hit it off straight away.title: We hit it off straight away
We hit it off straight away.summary: We hit it off straight away! Communicated online and phone for a month before taking the plunge and meeting up in person. I fell head over heels after I met him. We are getting married at the end of the month!

children.text: We hit it off straight away! Communicated online and phone for a month before taking the plunge and meeting up in person. I fell head over heels after I met him. We are getting married at the end of the month!

Wedding bells!.title: Wedding bells!
Wedding bells!.summary: We met on RSVP in May and have now been together almost a year!

children.text: We met on RSVP in May and have now been together almost a year!
Wedding bells next year!

Wedding to come!.title: Wedding to come!
Wedding to come!.summary: We met in April/May of 2013 and have been inseparable since. I'm happy to revisit and share a wedding pic later for success stories.

children.text: We met in April/May of 2013 and have been inseparable since. I'm happy to revisit and share a wedding pic later for success stories.

Without RSVP we wouldn't have met.title: Without RSVP we wouldn't have met
Without RSVP we wouldn't have met.summary: My partner and I met through RSVP in February 2014. We always felt comfortable with each other and became an official couple after a few months.

children.text: My partner and I met through RSVP in February 2014. We always felt comfortable with each other and became an official couple after a few months.
We just wanted to say thank you for this opportunity. Without you, we wouldn't have met each other as I lived in Brisbane and he was based on the Gold Coast.
Now we live together on the coast and are so grateful to have with each other. Hope our experience encourage other singles who is looking for love!

three hour chat.title: three hour chat
three hour chat.summary: I met this amazing woman on RSVP that happen to be a #1 in the top 100 the week we met. The story goes...

children.text: I met this amazing woman on RSVP that happen to be a #1 in the top 100 the week we met. The story goes...

I met Jenn on the 4th March 2016 and we chatted for quite some time online as I had to go away to work for 26 days and we contacted each other by phone on the 12th March and had an amazing 3 hour conversation and we continued to talk for presiding 2 weeks every day that I was away.

We met in person on the 2nd April and my first words to Jenn were... "wow" then my second word was "wow" again! From that point we hit off which was to be an amazing adventure that life leads you when 2 people meet from 2 completely different worlds.

The rest is becoming more amazing every day discovering each other and realising that life can be great with the right person. I can only say a big THANK YOU to RSVP for this introduction to this beautiful amazing woman I call #1
